name: My Uncle Merlin
storyline:
My uncle Merlin is an upcoming interactive adventure regarding wizards in space. 
 
It is a tale of a young man, his uncle, and their unconventional journey through the vast unknown, on an unrelenting, dragon-propelled wizardly tower.
summary: An interactive adventure featuring wizards in space! Meet a bizarre bunch of characters and complete their wacky quests in our interactive adventure game, enriched with a few RPG elements.

videos.name: Trailer
